name: Wonderful Bored Mind
description:
Dina, a little girl, get bored in their car, so she decide to draw a little bird on the window with a Blue marker, what make the bird like he's flying outside, and by moving her head up down, left and right, she make him look like he move, so she decide with way, make him avoid anything painted in red.

since a lot of person liked the visual, I've put all the assets right here, for free :

https://senior-x.itch.io/wonderful-bored-mind-asse...
